title: demanding to speak to riot employee asap, please
body:
hi,

wanting to speak to a riot employee personally. will ignore others in this post. thanks

replies.body:
wont happen.
no problem

but since you ignore me anyways i wont tell you that you have to click the "support" at the top of the page to get to riot. no you can find that out yourself.
You "demand?" lmao. grow up. they got shit to do they arent going to surf their boards looking for people "demanding" to talk to them.Go make a  ticket.
Send a support ticket instead of spamming the boards please.

> [{quoted}](name=HivreXAngel,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=0aB4l1L4,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-04-22T01:43:42.716+0000)
>
> hi,
> 
> wanting to speak to a riot employee personally. will ignore others in this post. thanks

So the most expedient solution, not to mention the smartest one, is to make a post on the boards that are used for talking to other players.

Obviously!!
If you want to talk to a Riot employee, you'd have better luck sending in a ticket to support.

Salty baby got a chat restriction for acting like this, learned nothing from it, so they came to cry here.

They probably think "free speech" means they can run their mouth with no consequence.

If there was only some sort of Support system you could use that is the bottom of the page to put in information and talk with a Riot employee with! Why post something like this on the forum when you can just write to Support?
if its riot you want, why not message riot with a ticket? common sense

And what do you need to speak to them about?
No one will talk to you unless you tell them what the subject is.
...or just make an ahri cosplay post or something.....there is a better chance that they will respond to that than anything in here ;)
